conclusion: To solve this problem, we need to understand how the position and size of the shadows (A, B, C, and D) change when the light source moves to the back left or right.

premise: When the light source moves to the back left, the shadows will shift in the direction opposite to the new light source.
conclusion: The shadows will move towards the front right.

premise: When the light source moves to the back right, the shadows will shift in the direction opposite to the new light source.
conclusion: The shadows will move towards the front left.
